headline: Ingersoll Rand Schedules Fourth Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: DAVIDSON, N.C., Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ingersoll Rand Inc. (NYSE: IR), a global provider of mission-critical flow creation and life science and industrial solutions, will issue its fourth quarter 2025 earnings release after the market closes on Thursday, February 12, 2026. Ingersoll Rand will also host a live earnings conference call to discuss the fourth quarter results on Friday, February 13, 2026, at 8 a.m. Eastern Time. To participate in the call, please dial +1-888-330-3073, dome

headline: Ingersoll Rand (IR) Valuation Check After Rotation Into Defensive Industrial Stocks
summary: Ingersoll Rand (IR) moved higher as part of a broader shift into defensive industrial stocks after President Trump proposed a major defense budget increase that could lift sector wide demand. See our latest analysis for Ingersoll Rand. That rotation into defensive industrials has come on top of a steady backdrop, with a 90 day share price return of 10.71% and a 3 year total shareholder return of 49.10%, suggesting momentum has been building even as the latest move is tied to policy...

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid IR and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Ingersoll Rand has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small loss of 2.4% while holding steady at $85.51. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500â€™s 10.4% gain during that period.
